1.quiz: What actions can you perform using the SAP_FIORI_FOUNDATION_S4 task list? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.

option.label: B
option.text: Schedule a job the calculation of the SAPUI5 application index

option.label: D
option.text: Create user with generated bussines roles

2.quiz: When using the Java Startup and Control Framework to shut down an AS Java-based SAP system, which of the following stops the server process(es)?
2.description: Operation and Shutdown of an AS Java Instance

3.quiz: Which instances have processes that establish a connection to the database of the SAP system? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
3.description:
レプリケーションサーバ
SAP セントラルサービス
SAP NetWeaver アプリケーションサーバのアーキテクチャ
Additional Application Server Instance

4.quiz: What is the definition of “Transport Group” in the Transport Management System (TMS)?

option.label: A
option.text: A collection of SAP systems that are assigned to the same transport target group

option.label: B
option.text: A collection of SAP systems that are connected by transport routes

option.label: C
option.text: A collection of SAP systems that share the same transport directory

option.label: D
option.text: A collection of SAP systems that are controlled by same transport domain controller

5.quiz: Which processes can run optionally as part of the Central Services instance of an AS ABAP-based SAP system? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
5.description:
以下の図の右下のようにCentral ServicesはRFC Gatewayを含むことができます。
またCentral Services自体がMessage serverとEnqueue Serverから成り立っているのでこの２つはオプションではない

6.quiz: In ABAP programs, what are features of ABAP SQL that are not available with native SQL? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.

option.label: B
option.text: Excution of ABAP program as database procedure

option.label: D
option.text: Use of the AS ABAP Data buffer

6.description: <a href=https://it-biz.online/sap/opensql-nativesql target=_blank>【ABAP】オープンSQL/ネイティブSQLの違いを３分で/a>
